extracted_text: Dr. Maria Silva Senior Data Scientist Contact: maria.silva@datatech.io SUMMARY: PhD Data Scientist with 7 years of experience in machine learning and AI research. CORE COMPETENCIES: - Languages: Python, R, SQL, Scala, Julia - ML/AI: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, XGBoost, Keras - Analytics: Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly - Big Data: Apache Spark, Hadoop, Kafka, Elasticsearch - Cloud: Google Cloud Platform, AWS SageMaker, Azure ML - Databases: BigQuery, Snowflake, Cassandra, Neo4j CAREER HISTORY: - Principal Data Scientist, DataTech Corp (2020-Present) - 4 years - Senior ML Engineer, AI Innovations (2017-2020) - 3 years Total experience: 7 years in data science and machine learning ACADEMIC BACKGROUND: - PhD in Data Science and Machine Learning, MIT (2017) - MS in Applied Mathematics, Stanford University (2014) - BS in Statistics, UC Berkeley (2012) RESEARCH PROJECTS: - NLP Sentiment Analysis Engine: Deep learning model with 95% accuracy - Predictive Maintenance System: IoT-based ML pipeline for manufacturing - Computer Vision Platform: Real-time object detection using CNN - Fraud Detection Algorithm: Ensemble model preventing $2M+ losses annually - Recommendation Engine: Collaborative filtering system for 1M+ users
